Title: Includes nonconsensual use of bodily fluids and matter in harassment in the first degree and aggravated harassment in the first degree and strikes, shoves and kicks in aggravated harassment in the first degree
Summary: Includes nonconsensual use of bodily fluids and matter in harassment in the first degree and aggravated harassment in the first degree; includes strikes, shoves and kicks in aggravated harassment in the first degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the executive law, in relation to including nonconsensual use of bodily fluids and matter in harassment in the first degree and aggravated harassment in the first degree and including strikes, shoves and kicks in aggravated harassment in the first degree
